title: Itho Daalderop AR
subtitle: AR Application made for client
label: iOS App
summary: Developed the Itho Daalderop AR app during my internship at Studio-X, introducing users to the HRU400 product through an immersive AR experience. I spearheaded the AR functionality and UI design, enabling users to interact with a 3D model of the product by scanning a real-life image. This app enhances product exploration through detailed 3D inspections and animated sequences, showcasing product features innovatively.
